Title: Requires the commissioner of education to make recommendations to the board of regents relating to the adoption of instruction on dating violence
Summary: Requires the commissioner of education to make recommendations to the board of regents relating to the adoption of age-appropriate instruction on dating violence for students in grades seven through twelve.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of education to make recommendations to the board of regents relating to the adoption of instruction on dating violence for students in grades seven through twelve
